about.name: The following questions are from real DMV written tests. These are some of the actual permit questions you will face in California. Each permit practice test question has three answer choices. Select one answer for each question and select "grade this section." You can find this button at the bottom of the drivers license quiz.  For a complete list of questions and answers for California please visit https://cheat-sheets.dmv-written-test.com/en/california/car.

hasPart.name: When approaching an intersection with a flashing red light, you must:

about.name: When approaching an intersection with a flashing red light, you must:

hasPart.assesses: When approaching an intersection with a flashing red light, you must: | When approaching an intersection with a flashing red light, you must: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: A flashing red traffic light means the same thing as a stop sign. When arriving at an intersection with a flashing red light, you must come to a full stop and proceed when it is safe to do so.

suggestedAnswer.text: Come to a complete stop, yield to oncoming traffic and pedestrians, then proceed.

comment.text: Come to a complete stop, yield to oncoming traffic and pedestrians, then proceed.

suggestedAnswer.text: Reduce your speed and proceed with caution.

comment.text: Reduce your speed and proceed with caution.

suggestedAnswer.text: Come to a complete stop and remain stopped as long as the light is red.

comment.text: Come to a complete stop and remain stopped as long as the light is red.

acceptedAnswer.text: Come to a complete stop, yield to oncoming traffic and pedestrians, then proceed.

comment.text: Come to a complete stop, yield to oncoming traffic and pedestrians, then proceed.

answerExplanation.text: A flashing red traffic light means the same thing as a stop sign. When arriving at an intersection with a flashing red light, you must come to a full stop and proceed when it is safe to do so.

comment.text: When approaching an intersection with a flashing red light, you must: | A flashing red traffic light means the same thing as a stop sign. When arriving at an intersection with a flashing red light, you must come to a full stop and proceed when it is safe to do so.

hasPart.name: While driving at night, a vehicle coming toward you has its high beams on, making it hard for you to see the road ahead. You should:

about.name: While driving at night, a vehicle coming toward you has its high beams on, making it hard for you to see the road ahead. You should:

hasPart.assesses: While driving at night, a vehicle coming toward you has its high beams on, making it hard for you to see the road ahead. You should: | While driving at night, a vehicle coming toward you has its high beams on, making it hard for you to see the road ahead. You should: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: If an oncoming driver fails to dim their high beams, you should avoid looking directly at the headlights. Instead, look toward the right edge of your lane and watch the oncoming vehicle out of the corner of your eye.

suggestedAnswer.text: Look ahead toward the left edge of your lane.

comment.text: Look ahead toward the left edge of your lane.

suggestedAnswer.text: Look ahead toward the right edge of your lane.

comment.text: Look ahead toward the right edge of your lane.

suggestedAnswer.text: Look straight ahead in your lane.

comment.text: Look straight ahead in your lane.

acceptedAnswer.text: Look ahead toward the right edge of your lane.

comment.text: Look ahead toward the right edge of your lane.

answerExplanation.text: If an oncoming driver fails to dim their high beams, you should avoid looking directly at the headlights. Instead, look toward the right edge of your lane and watch the oncoming vehicle out of the corner of your eye.

hasPart.name: Before stopping your vehicle at a traffic signal or sign, you should:

about.name: Before stopping your vehicle at a traffic signal or sign, you should:

hasPart.assesses: Before stopping your vehicle at a traffic signal or sign, you should: | Before stopping your vehicle at a traffic signal or sign, you should: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: When stopping your vehicle on the roadway, first check your mirrors for traffic. Be aware of surrounding drivers as you release the accelerator and allow your vehicle to slow. Move your foot to the brake pedal and press with steady pressure for a smooth stop.

suggestedAnswer.text: Press down hard on the accelerator.

comment.text: Press down hard on the accelerator.

suggestedAnswer.text: Check your mirrors for surrounding traffic.

comment.text: Check your mirrors for surrounding traffic.
Set the parking brake.

acceptedAnswer.text: Check your mirrors for surrounding traffic.

comment.text: Check your mirrors for surrounding traffic.

answerExplanation.text: When stopping your vehicle on the roadway, first check your mirrors for traffic. Be aware of surrounding drivers as you release the accelerator and allow your vehicle to slow. Move your foot to the brake pedal and press with steady pressure for a smooth stop.

comment.text: Before stopping your vehicle at a traffic signal or sign, you should: | When stopping your vehicle on the roadway, first check your mirrors for traffic. hasPart.name: You hit a parked vehicle and can't find the owner. What must you do?

about.name: You hit a parked vehicle and can't find the owner. What must you do?

hasPart.assesses: You hit a parked vehicle and can't find the owner. What must you do? | You hit a parked vehicle and can't find the owner. What must you do? -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: If you hit a parked vehicle or other property, you must leave a note with your name, phone number, and address securely attached to the vehicle or property that you hit.

suggestedAnswer.text: Call your insurance company when you get home.

comment.text: Call your insurance company when you get home.

suggestedAnswer.text: Wait for the owner to return.

comment.text: Wait for the owner to return.

suggestedAnswer.text: Leave a note with your name and address on the parked vehicle.

comment.text: Leave a note with your name and address on the parked vehicle.

acceptedAnswer.text: Leave a note with your name and address on the parked vehicle.

comment.text: Leave a note with your name and address on the parked vehicle.

answerExplanation.text: If you hit a parked vehicle or other property, you must leave a note with your name, phone number, and address securely attached to the vehicle or property that you hit.

comment.text: You hit a parked vehicle and can't find the owner. What must you do? | If you hit a parked vehicle or other property, you must leave a note with your name, phone number, and address securely attached to the vehicle or property that you hit.

hasPart.name: What is the only medically proven method of removing alcohol or other drug combinations from your system?

about.name: What is the only medically proven method of removing alcohol or other drug combinations from your system?

hasPart.assesses: What is the only medically proven method of removing alcohol or other drug combinations from your system? | What is the only medically proven method of removing alcohol or other drug combinations from your system? -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Alcohol takes effect quickly and is slow to leave your system. Cold showers, black coffee, and exercise will do nothing to reduce a person's blood alcohol content (BAC). The only way to lower your BAC is to wait.

comment.text: Breathe in some fresh air.
Give your body time.
Drink coffee.
Give your body time.

answerExplanation.text: Alcohol takes effect quickly and is slow to leave your system. Cold showers, black coffee, and exercise will do nothing to reduce a person's blood alcohol content (BAC). The only way to lower your BAC is to wait.

comment.text: What is the only medically proven method of removing alcohol or other drug combinations from your system? | Alcohol takes effect quickly and is slow to leave your system. Cold showers, black coffee, and exercise will do nothing to reduce a person's blood alcohol content (BAC). The only way to lower your BAC is to wait.

educationalAlignment.targetName: What is the only medically proven method of removing alcohol or other drug combinations from your system?

hasPart.name: If the roadway is wet or icy, you should:

about.name: If the roadway is wet or icy, you should:

hasPart.assesses: If the roadway is wet or icy, you should: | If the roadway is wet or icy, you should: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Because your tires will not grip the road under wet, snowy, or icy conditions as well as they will under dry conditions, you should slow down if the roadway is wet or icy.

comment.text: Reduce your speed.
Drive at the posted speed.
Speed up.
Reduce your speed.

answerExplanation.text: Because your tires will not grip the road under wet, snowy, or icy conditions as well as they will under dry conditions, you should slow down if the roadway is wet or icy.

comment.text: If the roadway is wet or icy, you should: | Because your tires will not grip the road under wet, snowy, or icy conditions as well as they will under dry conditions, you should slow down if the roadway is wet or icy.

educationalAlignment.targetDescription: If the roadway is wet or icy, you should: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
